mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
select count(bno) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, replyText, replyer) values (#{bno},#{replyText}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replyText=#{replyText}, updateDate=now() where rno = #{rno}
